name: Enough For Now
description:
Survive as many turns as possible.

Eat Food to end your turn and draw 7 new cards.
Get more Food by making a Fire.
If you don't have the right cards, use Wood to draw more.
Each turn, more Fear will creep into your deck.
You will have to embrace the fears to survive.

Hint: Try to play just enough cards to survive the next round.
